name: Under development
description: The organisation is responsible for data covered by this specification

name: Project
description: The organisation is part of a project developing a specification for this dataset

name: Expected data
description: The organisation should provide data to this standard

name: Mandated data
description: The organisation must provide data to this standard

name: Authoritative source
description: The organisation is the authoritative source of this data

name: Alternative source
description: The organisation provides data which can help verify this data
